CustomField.description: US 15424 Usability - Easily differentiate case's for different record types
CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName , "CH_Problem" , IMAGE( "/resource/1551357186000/CH_Problem_Icon" ,'Problem',32,32), "CH_NokiaStandardCase" , IMAGE( "/resource/1551420000000/CH_Standard_Icon" ,'Nokia Standard Case',32,32), "CH_NokiaInformationRequest" , IMAGE( "/resource/1551420268000/CH_InfoRequest_Icon" ,'Nokia Information Request',32,32), ' ')
CustomField.label: Record Type Icon
